taskDefinition.name: AWS EC2 Disassociate Route Table
taskDefinition.author: support@kineticdata.com
taskDefinition.description: Disassociates a subnet from a route table. After you perform this action, the subnet no longer uses the routes in the route table. Instead, it uses the routes in the VPC's main route table.

parameter.label: Dry Run
parameter.tooltip: true or false. Dry run validates user permissions. Error response will be 'DryRunOperation' if the account has the proper permissions; 'UnauthorizedOperation' if the account does not have the proper permissions.

parameter.label: Association ID
parameter.tooltip: The association ID representing the current association between the route table and subnet.
